title: ‘Mad Scientist’ Triathlon Coach Olav Aleksander Bu and His Mission to Transform Cycling at Uno-X
content:
'There are still low-hanging fruits to grab': Visionary coach of tri dominators Blummenfelt and Iden believes he can bring his magic to new role at Uno-X Mobility.

Read the full article at ‘Mad Scientist’ Triathlon Coach Olav Aleksander Bu and His Mission to Transform Cycling at Uno-X on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
